title: Masks Are a Symptom | Guests: Justin Haskins & Sharyl Attkisson | 11/19/20
description:
Joe Biden’s proposed gun restrictions are ridiculous, Pennsylvania mandates masks in private homes, and The New York Times called the Great Reset a “baseless conspiracy.” Georgia Rep. Barry Loudermilk talks about the Senate runoffs and the fight between Sen. Lindsey Graham and Georgia’s secretary of state. Could the Hunter Biden scandal have tanked Joe Biden if the media had covered it? Justin Haskins shows how the socialists’ strategy to take over Democratic strongholds is working. New York Gov. Cuomo shouted down a reporter for asking about closing schools. Glenn argues what the mask debate is really about. Investigative reporter Sharyl Attkisson talks how journalists are becoming propagandists and her new book, “Slanted.”
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
